sentences.sContent: The response to the jury’s verdict was one of outrage.
sentences.sCn: 陪审团的裁决引发了愤慨。

synos.tran: 凌辱，强奸；对…施暴行；激起愤怒

remMethod.val: out (过度) + rage (狂怒， 狂暴) → 过分狂暴 →骇人听闻的事件

words.tran: 粗暴的；可恶的；令人吃惊的
义愤填膺的；愤慨的，气愤的
使愤怒（outrage的过去式，过去分词）

trans.tranOther: a feeling of great anger and shock

trans.tranCn: 凌辱，强奸；对…施暴行；激起愤怒
trans.tranOther: to make someone feel very angry and shocked
